Name: IZBOT 2
About the game: IZBOT 2 is a fast paced precision platformer with tight controls, hand crafted levels, large powerful bosses and fast respawns. Use your cat like reflexes to guide our hero IZBOT through buzz saws, lasers and a ton of pointy spikes to save the metropolis from the evil Bedlor once more. Story IZBOT has defeated Bedlor and the organic invasion but in a final act of defiance Bedlor has uploaded his consciousness into the city's network and turned all the peace loving robots against our hero. Features Still no underwater levels. Fast paced precision platforming. Wall slides, dashing and double jumps. Super quick respawns. Cute robots.
